title.hiragana: ぞうとうのしゅうかん

items.english: Small gift of money given by parents and relatives to children on New Year's Day
Gift celebrating a birth (baby clothes, toys, etc.)
Gift given in July or August to someone you are indebted to (doctor, teacher, boss, etc.)
Gift given in December to someone you are indebted to (doctor, teacher, boss, etc.)
Present given when visiting a sick person (flowers, fruits, etc.)
